jcr:content.jcr:title: Grammy Award for Best Gospel Performance, Traditional

contentheadline.headline: Grammy Award for Best Gospel Performance, Traditional

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} The [[Grammy Award]] for '''Best Gospel Performance, Traditional''' was awarded from 1978 to 1983. Years reflect the year in which the Grammy Awards were presented, for works released in the previous year. ==1980s== *[[Grammy Awards of 1983]] **[[The Blackwood Brothers]] for ''I'm Following You '' *[[Grammy Awards of 1982]] **[[The Masters V]] for ''The Masters V'' *[[Grammy Awards of 1981]] **[[The Blackwood Brothers]] for ''We Come to Worship'' *[[Grammy Awards of 1980]] **[[The Blackwood Brothers]] for ''Lift Up the Name of Jesus'' ==1970s== *[[Grammy Awards of 1979]] **[[The Happy Goodman Family]] for ''Refreshing'' *[[Grammy Awards of 1978]] **[[The Oak Ridge Boys]] for "Just a Little Talk With Jesus" {{DEFAULTSORT:Grammy Award For Best Gospel Performance, Traditional}} [[Category:Grammy Awards for gospel music|Performance, Traditional]] {{Award-stub}}
